summary: A configuration holder that defines advanced parameters for running a Cellpose segmentation model, covering detection thresholds, image anisotropy, size filtering, augmentation, network averaging, hardware selection, batch processing, intensity inversion, tiling strategy, overlap, resampling, interpolation, and stitching of results.
business_intent: Allow researchers and developers to customize Cellpose behavior to achieve more accurate and efficient cell or nucleus segmentation on 2‑D and 3‑D microscopy data, adapting to varying image qualities and hardware constraints.
